newsitem.title: IRAN: Iran cargo vessel sinks in Gulf, two feared dead.
newsitem.headline: Iran cargo vessel sinks in Gulf, two feared dead.

text.p: Two crew members were missing and feared dead after an Iranian cargo vessel sank near the mouth of the Gulf, Iran's news agency IRNA said on Monday.
It said rescue teams were searching for the bodies of the two missing seamen after rescuing the remaining 11 passengers of the vessel that sank in rough seas off Abu Musa island on Sunday.
The cargo dhow, a traditional wooden boat, was carrying 200 tonnes of flour from the United Arab Emirates, IRNA added.
